snippet: OLNICK--Sylvia. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem deeply mourn the passing of Sylvia Olnick, our beloved friend and Board member. Sylvia's dedication to the Museum manifested in gifts to the collections and endowment campaigns and leadership of our Palm Beach benefits. Sylvia and her love for the Museum will be long remembered. We extend heartfelt condolences to Barbara and Rick; and to Allison, Meredith, and the entire family. Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM; Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board Co-Chairs, AFIM; James S. Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher Dir., IM; Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem deeply mourn the passing of Sylvia Olnick, our beloved friend and Board member. Sylvia's dedication to the Museum manifested in gifts to the collections and endowment campaigns and leadership of our Palm Beach benefits. Sylvia and her love for the Museum will be long remembered. We extend heartfelt condolences to Barbara and Rick; and to Allison, Meredith, and the entire family. Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM; Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board Co-Chairs, AFIM; James S. Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher Dir., IM; Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
